text: The 1944 Connecticut gubernatorial election was held on November 7, 1944. It was the third consecutive gubernatorial race between the same two nominees. Incumbent Republican Raymond E. Baldwin defeated Democratic nominee Robert A. Hurley with 50.48% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== Major party candidates *Raymond E. Baldwin, Republican *Robert A. Hurley, Democratic Other candidates *Jasper McLevy, Socialist *Joseph C. Borden Jr., Socialist Labor ===Results=== ==References== 1944 Connecticut Gubernatorial
title: 1944 Connecticut gubernatorial election
